sentences.sContent: And protect your eyes from snow and ice glare with dark glasses or goggles.
sentences.sContent_eng: And protect your eyes from snow and ice glare with dark glasses or goggles.
sentences.sCn: 使用深色眼镜或者护目镜来保护你的眼镜不受冰雪眩光的影响。

synos.tran: [安全]护目镜；防护眼镜；瞪视（goggle的复数）

trans.tranCn: 护目镜； 风镜； 游泳镜
trans.tranOther: a pair of  glasses  made of glass or plastic with a rubber or plastic edge that fit against your skin and protect your eyes
